effect.@en: As this weapon lands, it emits smoke in a Burst Template, creating Heavy Obscurement. Combatants inside cannot take advantage of Medium, Long or Extreme Distances. Additional modifiers may be put in place if attackers attempt to hit combatants inside the smoke. It does not break the line of sight. The smoke’s effects remain for 1D10+1 minutes unless the Historian determines heavy wind disperses it after one minute.
